nodes.text: The Funeral of Yarael Poof took place after Master Poof sacrificed himself in order to protect Coruscant from Ashaar Khorda; an Annoo-dat radical. Poof's body was recovered after he had been stabbed by Khorda, who also died from his injuries. His remains were then brought to the Jedi Temple, and brought to the Jedi Pyre for the service. The Jedi High Council, Obi-Wan Kenobi and his apprentice, Anakin Skywalker, and the three Quermian Jedi Kindee Ya, Vinian Ska and Loo Raelo were present, with Mace Windu eulogizing.
